resume_text:
NAME: Bob Johnson
EMAIL: bob.johnson@example.com
PHONE: (555) 987-6543

SUMMARY:
Experienced DevOps Engineer with a passion for automation and infrastructure as code. Proven ability to build and manage scalable and reliable systems in cloud environments.

SKILLS:
AWS, Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform, Jenkins, Git, Python

EXPERIENCE:
Cloud Solutions Inc. - DevOps Engineer (2018 - Present)
- Designed and implemented CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins and Docker.
- Managed AWS infrastructure using Terraform and Kubernetes.

TechStart - Systems Administrator (2016 - 2018)
- Managed Linux servers and network infrastructure.
- Implemented monitoring solutions.

EDUCATION:
State College - Associate's in Information Technology (2016)

CERTIFICATIONS:
AWS Certified Solutions Architect
